TopicTitle: Make old Mk3 Craft file to match 0.90??

Articles.Content:
Hi! ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif)

So i found this amazing craft on reddit, but when i try to load it, it says the "mk3SpacePlaneAdapter" and "Mark3Cockpit" is missing, becuase the craft file is from 0.23.5.

How do i go into the craft file and edit it to 0.90? If anyone can make the craft work in 0.90, please upload it to me ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif) And ofcuase i have the neccesary mods.

File:  [https://www.dropbox.com/s/ledeqpj4088pcav/K_S_S_%20Hydra.craft](https://www.dropbox.com/s/ledeqpj4088pcav/K_S_S_%20Hydra.craft)

Reddit post: [http://www.reddit.com/r/KerbalSpaceProgram/comments/22talq/the_maiden_voyage_of_my_self_refueling_star_ship/](http://www.reddit.com/r/KerbalSpaceProgram/comments/22talq/the_maiden_voyage_of_my_self_refueling_star_ship/)
